title: Coupled Spin Torque Nano Oscillators for Low Power Neural Computation
authors: K Yogendra, D Fan, K Roy -
excerpt: We present coupled spin torque nano oscillators (STNOs) as electronic neurons for efficient brain-inspired computation. The coupled STNOs show two distinct outputs, depending on whether the frequencies are locked or not. The locking mechanisms are based on  ...

title: STT-SNN: A Spin-Transfer-Torque Based Soft-Limiting Non-Linear Neuron for Low-Power Artificial Neural Networks
authors: D Fan, Y Shim, A Raghunathan, K Roy - arXiv preprint arXiv:1412.8648

title: Spin orbit torque based electronic neuron
authors: A Sengupta, SH Choday, Y Kim, K Roy - Applied Physics Letters
excerpt: A device based on current-induced spin-orbit torque (SOT) that functions as an electronic neuron is proposed in this work. The SOT device implements an artificial neuron's thresholding (transfer) function. In the first step of a two-step switching scheme, a charge  ...
